snippet.title: Ghost Files: Memory of a Crime
snippet.description:
Love Games? Subscribe and click the Bell to get notified of new game releases every day!

Arthur Christie wakes up next to an unknown dead man without any recollection of how he got there or who he is.

You can try the game here for free: https://www.wildtangent.com/Games/ghost-files-2-ce

WildTangent Links:
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/WildTangentGames
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/PlayWildTangent
TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/wildtangentgames
PINTEREST: https://www.pinterest.com/playwildtangent/
EMAIL: https://goo.gl/nix4aW
